channel.title: Eyesight
channel.description: Hello moparscape.. I need help, my fucking eyes are killing me and I have a headache. I can barely see shit and I have perfect vision.. Have I been online too long? It's 11:30pm where I live, am I tired? Is my mind tired or something? Should I sleep or do my homework? I have a lot of work to do but if I'm risking my vision then I'm going to say fuck the homework. Thanks.

item.title: Eyesight
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

If you have hit your head recently DO NOT SLEEP, id suggest calling a hospital or going yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Eyesight
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Get your blood pressure checked.

Read full topic

item.title: Eyesight
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

`SJ_:

Also, have you been doing sports lately? If so you might have a minor concussion.

Nothing that could have given me a concussion.

Read full topic

item.title: Eyesight
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Also, have you been doing sports lately? If so you might have a minor concussion.

Read full topic

item.title: Eyesight
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Yea headaches are a pain in the neck.

They usually go away after I sleep, but if they don’t I make sure to drink lots of water and stay away from sugar and salt until it’s gone.

Read full topic

item.title: Eyesight
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:9, topic:417823”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=520367.msg3779324#msg3779324 date=1318332086]
Uhm… are you taking some kind of medication?
[/quote]

Or high-caffeine intake[/quote]

No medication, no caffeine…
I slept and the eye problem is gone, now it’s just the headache.

Read full topic

item.title: Eyesight
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

Uhm… are you taking some kind of medication?

Or high-caffeine intake

Read full topic

item.title: Eyesight
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

This has happened to me and even when I closed mine, they would continue to hurt. I found out later is was because I was going through withdraws. -.-

Uhm… are you taking some kind of medication?

Read full topic

item.title: Eyesight
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Happens to me occasionally. Should be fine after you sleep.

Read full topic

item.title: Eyesight
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:5, topic:417823”][quote author=`SJ_ link=topic=520367.msg3779100#msg3779100 date=1318303827]
I would try taking a tylenol, and going to bed. Or getting off the computer and relaxing for a little bit. Rest your eyes, if the problem persists I would ask your mom to take you to an optometrist.
[/quote]

Good idea. Skip school tomorrow and tell her how I can barely see and it’s serious, because I’m looking at the work I have to do and I can barely read it, like this message, just hoping I’m not making any grammar mistakes.

When I close my eyes, it’s like throbbing…

I’m going to bed, post results in the morning[/quote]
Advertisements happen depending on what you post here sometimes, topics you look at, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Eyesight
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

`SJ_:

I would try taking a tylenol, and going to bed. Or getting off the computer and relaxing for a little bit. Rest your eyes, if the problem persists I would ask your mom to take you to an optometrist.

Good idea. Skip school tomorrow and tell her how I can barely see and it’s serious, because I’m looking at the work I have to do and I can barely read it, like this message, just hoping I’m not making any grammar mistakes.

When I close my eyes, it’s like throbbing…

I’m going to bed, post results in the morning

Read full topic

item.title: Eyesight
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

What’s it feel like when you close your eyes? If it’s relieving, get off the computer and maybe start your homework and finish tomorrow morning or go to bed.

Read full topic

item.title: Eyesight
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

I’ve been nolifing com00per since I was 3, and sometimes, I get these bitchass headaches (I don’t play as much anymore though, simply because not enough time)

As for most of your questions, you have to ask yourself that, are you tired? Does your head hurt? We can’t see inside your mind

I’d say if you really can’t do the homework try waking up like an hour or 2 early before school, the headache will probably be gone and try to do as much HW as you can.

Read full topic

item.title: Eyesight
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

I would try taking a tylenol, and going to bed. Or getting off the computer and relaxing for a little bit. Rest your eyes, if the problem persists I would ask your mom to take you to an optometrist.

Read full topic
